# Canadian Trading Compliance Module Requirements

# Core dependencies
redis>=4.5.0          # For distributed monitoring and caching
sqlite3               # Built-in, for audit trail storage

# Data handling
python-dateutil>=2.8.2    # Date manipulation utilities

# Async support
asyncio               # Built-in, for async operations

# Optional dependencies for production
# psycopg2-binary>=2.9.5   # PostgreSQL support for audit trail
# pymongo>=4.3.3           # MongoDB support for large-scale audit storage
# boto3>=1.26.0            # AWS S3 for long-term record storage
# cryptography>=40.0.0     # For encryption of sensitive audit records
